name: Overview
data: [{"id":"4f5c1325-1381-4b2e-9d1a-b16d7294ed22","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"File Overview: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"nodes.py","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1bd0b723-6955-4efb-aa88-e8e2b494a478","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"nodes.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" module provides the foundational infrastructure for linking the abstract logical model of a program to its physical source code structure. In static analysis, a namespace (like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"project.auth.login","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") is simply a string; however, to perform deep analysis, the engine must be able to access the actual ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Abstract Syntax Tree (AST)","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" node associated with that string.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"39ef40b3-df4a-4564-95c7-2bac9728b9d5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This file acts as the \"address book\" for the codebase, allowing any component of the Jarvis engine to resolve a symbolic name back into the specific block of code it represents.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cc6970cf-e23b-4fbb-8c20-1f9d949a8cd3","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"477eed68-85d8-4770-8a30-d429eae87dee","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Core Purpose and Role","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2d39dc4e-dfed-4eae-a0f4-367e2b60e03b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The primary goal of this module is to support code navigation and call resolution:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"74c6f158-9ce2-4dc3-9338-a67684e9fd18","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Node Persistence","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": During the initial parsing phase, Jarvis identifies functions, classes, and modules. This module ensures those structural components are stored and kept accessible throughout the entire analysis lifecycle.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"61650911-8541-48fc-9165-dc8678b07f3d","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Canonical Mapping","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It maintains a one-to-one relationship between a fully qualified namespace and its definition. This prevents the system from becoming confused if a function is imported into multiple different files.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f609b29f-97e9-4170-91cf-cd46e7230098","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"On-Demand Retrieval","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It enables \"jump-to-definition\" capabilities. When the analyzer encounters a function call, it uses this module to fetch the target function's code for immediate inspection.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b5fda09e-ff13-4cc2-b835-aebdfa997e14","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"0241158f-1972-48bc-99dd-8d2634378ddf","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Components","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7eccccc0-8147-4cf7-9aca-c8334293bcaa","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"NodeManager","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5f5f73af-d3fc-4621-bdd3-00adb79f0d83","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"NodeManager","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is the central authority in this module. It manages an internal registry that maps unique namespace strings to their corresponding AST objects.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9ba8d1fd-3328-46c2-8845-d93ad7b0f739","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Its operations are designed to be efficient and stable:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6f65aba5-964b-4362-b926-5cc1b0ad0104","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Registration","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It captures nodes as they are first discovered.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c44ac158-ef58-42fc-9f5a-e475a9caddcc","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Conflict Prevention","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It ensures that once a namespace is mapped to a node, it cannot be accidentally overwritten, preserving the integrity of the original source definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d8c50141-5479-4e7b-ad78-fcefb7e3e02b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Global Access","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It provides a simple lookup interface (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") that serves as the entry point for inter-procedural analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ef926cab-47f2-47a4-a7c5-7a2e7ccdc32a","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"19cfa361-2acb-4d57-8073-4c9d1f4521bb","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"System Integration & Relationship","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0b699130-d749-4cca-aef7-09e6985810fe","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"nodes.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" module sits at the intersection of the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Parser","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Analyzer","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":":","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c101054b-bccc-45dc-8c1a-19eae8ed323f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The Parser's Role","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": As the system first scans the project files, the Parser uses the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"NodeManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to \"check in\" every function and class it finds.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5cdc611a-6d63-4169-9da5-16955e3cef14","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The Analyzer's Role","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": When the Analyzer is tracing data flow and hits a function call, it queries the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"NodeManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". If the manager returns a node, the Analyzer can \"step into\" that node to see how variables are manipulated inside that function.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"23314ebb-979f-41c4-95f4-8e0393054c6e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Memory Management","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": By storing references to AST nodes in a centralized manager, Jarvis avoids re-parsing the same files multiple times, significantly reducing the memory and CPU overhead of the analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c8f7e54c-5e78-4721-93d1-0ccc21be779b","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"a56790aa-1d01-49f4-b8d0-14a8653312aa","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Brief Insight / Tutorial","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"78ecc9ea-b1f9-4618-b145-fe71b296ae01","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Resolving a Function Call","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"eba8e230-2361-47df-8eed-f2633ffc2733","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Imagine you are analyzing a line of code: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"result = validate_token(t)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9dff3773-3c5c-4b34-8700-90e7ef8a6034","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Lookup","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The engine determines that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"validate_token","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" refers to the namespace ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"auth.utils.validate_token","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"41b2f5e5-f35d-489d-be09-8f587169c91a","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Request","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The engine calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"node_manager.get(\"auth.utils.validate_token\")","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"53889137-0237-475e-b9c9-00240b4f5d08","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Navigation","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The manager returns the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"FunctionDef","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" AST node.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6ce3e457-fdcb-4eda-9981-b1fd560eba2e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Inspection","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The engine can now look at the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"node.body","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to see exactly what ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"validate_token","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" does, what it returns, and what other functions it might call.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4d6aad8c-53d9-46c8-8e0d-d539a5891311","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This module essentially turns the flat list of source files into a searchable, navigable network of interconnected logic.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"419b80f5-4ed2-4316-985a-d208991ef907","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
